title: Mass Effect: Andromeda - Super Deluxe Edition (v1.0.9 + All DLCs
description: Screenshots: http://imgdragon.net/image/8b0g http://imgdragon.net/image/8eSL http://imgdragon.net/image/9EXh http://imgdragon.net/image/9X8m ü Repack Features Based on Mass.Effect.Andromeda-CPY ISO release: cpy-mea.iso (55,024,533,504 bytes) Mass.Effect.Andromeda.Update.v1.09-CODEX (3.7 GB) & missing updated localization files added Includes all released DLCs 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation Trial executable and Bonus Soundtrack in WAVe format ripped, NOTHING re-encoded Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of voicepacks you don't need Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 54.9 to 29.7~30.2 GB for any single voice language) Installation takes: ~40 minutes on 8-cores CPU + SSD; ~1 hour 40 minutes on 4-cores CPU + HDD; around 2 hours on 2-cores CPU + HDD (officially not supported by this game) After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly HDD space after installation: up to 52 GB (~85 GB during installation) At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack Repack by FitGirl Backwards Compatibility This repack IS NOT backwards compatible with my previous repacks of the game
